de.weltraumschaf.speakingurl

Interface Slug

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlugImplementation

    public interface Slug
    Implementations of this interface can create a slug from any string.

    A slug is a so called 'static' or 'Clean URL' or 'Pretty URL' or 'nice-looking URL' or 'Speaking URL' or 'user-friendly URL' or 'SEO-friendly URL' from a string. This module aims to transliterate the input string.

    The implementation is thread safe because the state of the slug is not stored in fields. Except of the options, but they are immutable. That's the reason why you must use a builder to configure and create a slug.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sascha Droste , Sven Strittmatter
